Perceptor fires a missile at Tarantulas, not seeing him but hearing him.
Dragonfly fires twin lasers at Nighteyes...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 9:06 PM
Subject: Re: Battle


> JP, you're forgetting that Killfest is very very large.
>
> Yikes, I forgot about Airshadow's chars that I was supposed to
> control!
>
> ::Killfest/Greven/EndBringer/Scyther/Goldeneye/Darkmouse/DrillBit/Doll
> en/Darkfate::
>
> Killfest laughs as Aerostreak tackles him, stepping back slightly to
> keep his balance. It took alot more than a tackle to take down a bot
> as large as Killfest. A shot nearly hits Killfest's head, but misses
> by an inch.
>
> Killfest grabbs Aerostreak with one large hand, slamming the bot down
> onto his knee and the pointed spike on it.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Greven laughs as shots pummell his armor, denting it. He aims his
> missile launchers, sending out two from each launcher at Nighteyes.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> (Please remember the shot limits, JP)
>
> EndBringer fires two missiles at the incoming missiles, managing to
> take five of them out. The remaining three hit him in the chest,
> sending him flying backwards. He roars and jumps up, firing two
> missiles from each launcher at Tarantulus.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scyther rolls in the air, avoiding several shots. One of them hits
> him in the side, but does little damage.
>
> Flipping out his charge launcher, he fires off three charges down at
> Akron, some hitting the trees and setting them on fire, others
> passing through the canopy toward Akron.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DrillBit swears as he's sent flying backwards by an energon bolt. He
> returns fire with his gatling gun.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> A shot hits right in front of Dollen, charring the bushes. He fires
> back with a charge.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> A shadow passes over the fighting bots as a five-headed dragon flies
> over the battlefield.
>
> "I have arrived," Darkfate says to Killfest over the comm as he
> breathes fire over the enemies.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> >     Tarantulas, in his vhicle mode, flew off his tires as al lthe
> shots aimed
> > at him impacted. He gathered his thought, and sent a batch of eight
> cluster
> > missles at EndBringer.
> >
> >     Tankkor growled as he was pelted with blasts. He turned and
> sent his mian
> > laser turret blast at Killfest.
> >
> >     Nighteyes covered her head, and with a bleeding hand, began to
> unload on
> > Greven.
> >
> >     Aerostreak dove into Killfest, sending them both skidding
> across the
> > forest floor. (Hope you dont take that as a mode, sorry if you do.)
> >
> >     Akron pickes her target. She see's Darkmouse and Scather,
> (Well, dosent
> > actually see Scather) and sends several Energon bolt blasts at them.
> >
> >     Putnam spots Golden eyes, and takes off into the air. He
> extends his
> > hands and manages to grab hold of her leg, and begins to drain some
> energy
> > out of her.
> >
> >     Odiphious takes his riffle out and fires at Drillbit, and then
> sends an
> > energon bolt at him.
> >
> >     Venus, armed with an energon pistol, fires at Dollen. She is
> stil lsore
> > from a hit she took in the shoulder.
> >
> >     Megatron turns to Megaton. "Come on, Megaton, Marine, Pheniox,
> Jackle,
> > and Gremlin. Youre all coming with me to help out in the forest.
> Lets go."
> >     Megatron was finally going to strech his legs after beening
> cooped up in
> > the ice cave for so long.
>
>
>
>
>
